page.title: 16LLOYD PARK S.CROYDON
page.content: There are many{recreational}activities such as jogging,walking dogs and different types of{sport}.There is a childrens play area with swings,slide,roundabout and a see_saw. There are seven football pitches,three tennis courts (which are privately owned) there is also a bowling club and a golf course near by. The{landscape}is quite flat and is mainly trees and grass, although there is a man_made chalk pit.The park covers 46.13 hectares. Local clubs and schools make use of the recreational faclities here, and on the other side of the main road at Combe Lodge.
